languages.text: "Некоторые ритуалы санкционирования ксеносов предполагают усекновение языка. Я с удовольствием обсужу внедрение этой славной традиции с Вольным Торговцем. При первой же возможности".
"Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."
languages.original_text: "Некоторые ритуалы санкционирования ксеносов предполагают усекновение языка. Я с удовольствием обсужу внедрение этой славной традиции с Вольным Торговцем. При первой же возможности".

traits.locale_text: "Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “有许多仪式可以异形变为为合法异形，其中包括切掉舌头。我很乐意在稍微方便的时候，与行商浪人讨论实施这一优良传统。”
languages.original_text: "Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: “有许多仪式可以异形变为为合法异形，其中包括切掉舌头。我很乐意在稍微方便的时候，与行商浪人讨论实施这一优良传统。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Certains châtiments, réservés d'ordinaire aux xénos, impliquent la mutilation de la langue. Je me ferais un plaisir de discuter de l'implémentation de cette glorieuse tradition avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à la première occasion. »
languages.original_text: "Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: « Certains châtiments, réservés d'ordinaire aux xénos, impliquent la mutilation de la langue. Je me ferais un plaisir de discuter de l'implémentation de cette glorieuse tradition avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} à la première occasion. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Algunos rituales de autorización de xenos involucran la mutilación de la lengua. Comerciante Independiente, me gustaría debatir la restauración de esta gloriosa práctica lo antes posible».
languages.original_text: "Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: «Algunos rituales de autorización de xenos involucran la mutilación de la lengua. Comerciante Independiente, me gustaría debatir la restauración de esta gloriosa práctica lo antes posible».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「異種族の神聖な儀式には舌を切るものがあるだろう。自由開拓者の都合がつき次第、その栄誉ある伝統を実行するよう喜んで議論してやる」
languages.original_text: "Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: 「異種族の神聖な儀式には舌を切るものがあるだろう。自由開拓者の都合がつき次第、その栄誉ある伝統を実行するよう喜んで議論してやる」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Bei manchen Ritualen der Xenos-Sanktionierung wird die Zunge verstümmelt. Ich würde zu gerne bei nächster Gelegenheit mit {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} über die Implementierung dieser glorreichen Tradition sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."

languages.text: "Bazı zeno onaylanma ayinlerinde dil kesilir. Bu şanlı geleneğin kabul edilip uygulanması konusunu Hür Tacir'le en yakın zamanda konuşacağım."
languages.original_text: "Some xenos-sanctioning rituals involve mutilation of the tongue. I would gladly discuss the implementation of this glorious tradition with the Rogue Trader at {mf|his|her} earliest convenience."

traits.locale_text: "Bazı zeno kabul ritüellerinde dil kesilir. Bu şanlı geleneğin uygulanması konusunu Hür Tacir'le en yakın zamanda konuşacağım."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
